name: Reshoot Proxima 3
overview: RESHOOT PROXIMA III has been developed by Richard Löwenstein, Kevin Saunders, and Altraz Virgill with many features we expect from some of the team behind the excellent Reshoot R series. Features such as lots of blasting action, a cool soundtrack, deadly enemies, 5 uniquely themed stages, 24 bit color pixel art, a steady 50 fps frame rate, and much much more you'll just have to experience for yourselves if you have a Commodore Amiga A1200, A4000 and CD32.
